exceptions.exn: In environment f1 : nat -> nat -> nat Hf1 : isPR 2 f1 f2 : nat -> nat -> nat Hf2 : isPR 2 f2 f3 : nat -> nat -> nat Hf3 : isPR 2 f3 f4 : nat -> nat -> nat Hf4 : isPR 2 f4 g : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Hg : isPR 4 g The term "g" has type "nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat" while it is expected to have type "nat -> nat -> nat -> nat" (cannot unify "nat -> nat" and "nat").
